reg_info.act_under: Private Security and Investigative Services Act, 2005

content.content: 1. (1) If, on January 30, 2012, a licensee holds a licence to act as a private investigator, a licence to act as a security guard or a licence to act as both a private investigator and a security guard, the term of the licence ends on the licensee’s first birthday following the day on which the term would otherwise end as indicated in the licence.  O. Reg. 448/11, s. 1. (2) If a licence to act as a private investigator, a licence to act as a security guard or a licence to act as both a private investigator and a security guard is issued on or after January 30, 2012, the term of the licence shall end on the applicant’s second birthday following the day on which the licence is issued.  O. Reg. 448/11, s. 1. (3) If a licence whose term will end on the licensee’s birthday under subsection (1) or (2) is renewed, the term of the renewed licence shall be two years.  O. Reg. 448/11, s. 1. (4) The term of a licence to engage in the business of selling the services of private investigators, a licence to engage in the business of selling the services of security guards and a licence to engage in the business of selling the services of both private investigators and security guards is, (a) two years, if the licence is issued or renewed on or after January 30, 2012 but before July 1, 2021; or (b) three years, if the licence is issued or renewed on or after July 1, 2021. O. Reg. 235/21, s. 1. (5), (6) Revoked: O. Reg. 235/21, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) If, on January 30, 2012, a licensee holds a licence to act as a private investigator, a licence to act as a security guard or a licence to act as both a private investigator and a security guard, the term of the licence ends on the licensee’s first birthday following the day on which the term would otherwise end as indicated in the licence.  O. Reg. 448/11, s. 1.

(2) If a licence to act as a private investigator, a licence to act as a security guard or a licence to act as both a private investigator and a security guard is issued on or after January 30, 2012, the term of the licence shall end on the applicant’s second birthday following the day on which the licence is issued.  O. Reg. 448/11, s. 1.

(3) If a licence whose term will end on the licensee’s birthday under subsection (1) or (2) is renewed, the term of the renewed licence shall be two years.  O. Reg. 448/11, s. 1.

(4) The term of a licence to engage in the business of selling the services of private investigators, a licence to engage in the business of selling the services of security guards and a licence to engage in the business of selling the services of both private investigators and security guards is,

(a) two years, if the licence is issued or renewed on or after January 30, 2012 but before July 1, 2021; or

(b) three years, if the licence is issued or renewed on or after July 1, 2021. O. Reg. 235/21, s. 1.

(5), (6) Revoked: O. Reg. 235/21, s. 1.
